story_10_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Phew... I’ve been thoroughly defeated.
What a grand battle that was!
story_10_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I used every bit of strength I could muster,
but it still wasn’t enough... Sounds like
it’s high time for some more training!
story_10_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’ve really come a long way, haven’t you.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
And you’re only getting stronger...
You remind me of Red and Blue when they first
beat me.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_0600_10: Wh-what’s so funny all of a sudden?!
story_10_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It sounds to me like that battle’s left you aching
for something in the past. You’ve got something
on your mind...about your journey here.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Hush, hush. You don’t have to say it out loud...
We both know that battling against
[Name:PlayerNickname ] is a thrill!
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Whatever you decide to do, it’s your choice.
Just don’t hold yourself back!
That’s never a good choice.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Well then! Now that you’ve acquired your
last badge, you’ll be heading back to
Centra City, I’d wager?
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I shall accompany you.
I’m overdue for a taste of the city air.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1400_10:
W-wait! You’re coming with us?!
Can...can you and me walk and talk
together on our way back?!
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Why, of course! I would like nothing better!
It’s a long walk back, so I hope to hear
lots of your stories.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Uh... Say, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...I just
remembered I’ve got this thing I need to do...
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You guys go on ahead!
I’ll meet you back in Centra City later.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I see...
It looks like he’s made up his mind, then.
story_10_07000/2401_1001_1900_10: Huh? Made up his mind for what?
story_10_07000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Well, it will be interesting to see how
all of this plays out... Hee hee.
